text: Does anyone have an example repo where they use gh-actions to change env variables on an ubuntu machine and install specific packages ?

elements.text: Does anyone have an example repo where they use gh-actions to change env variables on an ubuntu machine and install specific packages ?

text:
```    - name: Install packages on Ubuntu
      if: ${{ matrix.os == 'ubuntu-latest' }}
      run: sudo apt-get install python3-numpy python3-matplotlib openmpi-bin libopenmpi-dev libhdf5-dev```
to set environment variable, see <https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/actions/reference/workflow-commands-for-github-actions#setting-an-environment-variable>
